name: Broken Silence
description:
A serial killer is on the loose - the notorious Phantom. Fates intertwine when university student Marina and a police officer named Carl find themselves both kidnapped by the Phantom. They must work together to escape from the Phantom’s underground chamber. Take the role of either Marina or Carl, search for clues, and uncover the mystery of the Phantom. Will you survive?
